text: Tatitu Qullu (Aymara tatitu God (term of endearment for 'father'), qullu mountain,Yatiqirinaka Aru Pirwa (Aymara-Spanish Dictionary) also spelled Tatito Khollu, Tatitu Kkollu) is a mountain in the Andes of Bolivia. It is situated in the La Paz Department, José Manuel Pando Province, Santiago de Machaca Municipality, and in the Pacajes Province, Charaña Municipality. Tatitu Qullu lies north-east of the Sirk'i volcano and south of the village of Berenguela. == References == Category:Mountains of La Paz Department (Bolivia)
title: Tatitu Qullu
